title.description: Titles that are used before surnames or full names as a sign of respect

description.description: A textual description or title for the classification code.

quantity.description: The number of units to be provided.

unit.description: A description of the unit in which the supplies, services or works are provided (e.g. hours, kilograms)

tenderPeriod.description: The period when Framework Establishment is open for bids.

enquiryPeriod.description: The period during which potential bidders may submit enquiries for clarification.

datePublished.description: The date on which the document was first published.

awards.description: Information from the award phase of the contracting process. There can be more than one award per contracting process e.g. because the contract is split among different providers, or because it is a standing offer.
